item.title: Thank us Later (Los Angeles 2 Australia Mix)
item.description: Los Angeles 2 Australia Mix http://www54.zippyshare.com/v/36709652/file.html Jonathan Potts & Craig Williams THE REMIX Craig Williams 2010 Lollapolooza Remix Contest Winner + Jonathan Potts 2010 David Guetta Remix Contest Winner = Remix Mafia Two incredible people with two off the chart hits this year in music and business. www.worldwideearcandy.blogspot.com www.soundcloud.com/craigwilliamsmusic.com www.soundcloud.com/jonathanpotts www.facebook.com/djjonathanpotts

item.title: Yearbook
item.description: Yearbook http://www.mediafire.com/?ki2zvym5530 1.Jonathan Potts- Diamonds by the Riverside (Celebrity Intro) 2.Top 25 Songs of 2009 (I Gotta Feeling(Mash up) 3.Bloody Beetroots- Awesome 4.Laidback Luke/Diplo- Hey! 5.Major Lazer- Pon de Floor 6.LMFAO/Chuckie-Let the Bass Kick (Budapest vs B-Town) 7.Robyn-Show me Love (Afrojack Remix) vs BEP-Boom Boom Pow 8.Guru Josh Project-Infinity (Potts 09 Remix) 9.75, Brazil Street (Fish and Chips Remix) 10.Pitbull- I know you want me (Beat Thrillerz Rework) 11.Be Satisfaction (Laidback Luke/Swedish House Mafia) 12.Bob Sinclar-Lets Dance (Potts Re-edit) 13.David Guetta-On The Dancefloor (Will.I.Am-Original mix) 14.Jonathan Potts-Bitter Sweet Symphony (Electro Remix) 15.The Verve vs Supermode (Lance Armstrong vs Rhythm of the night) 16.Lily Allen-The Fear (B More re-work)Vocal edit (Hitler is Dead) 14.Eric Prydz-Pjanoo(Saxophone edit) Vocal edit (Break the House Down) 15.Eric Prydz-Pjanoo(Vocal Girl Acappela) 16.Deadmau5-Do you Like (Potts Vocal Re-edit) 17.Hidden Gem (Guess it right 1st 5 people win $100 cash) 18.Lady Gaga-Bad Romance (Bimbo Remix) 19.Akon/Guetta vs Kid Cudi/Crookers-Sexy Day n Night (Potts Vocal Twist) 20.Medina-You and I (Deadmau5 Remix) 21.Calvin Harris-Ready for the Weekend (Re edit) 22.Swedish House Mafia-Kidsos (Wippenberg edit) (MGMT Sample) 23.Sam La More-I Wish it Could Last (Rework) 24.Jackson vs Mau5-Ghosts N Criminals (King of Pop Tribute) 25.Sam Matthews aka Merv-Outro

item.title: Ear Candy (Mario vs. Zelda Electro Edition)
item.description: http://www23.zippyshare.com/v/60993364/file.html Track Listing: 1.Mario Introduction 2.Zelda Theme vs. LMFAO-Im in Budapest Bitch (Acapella) 3.Lil Wayne + Kanye West-Lollipop vs Numerology 4.Kanye West-American Boy (Electro Edition) 5.Nirvana-Teen Spirit(Potts LMFAO Vocal Remix) 6.Tiesto + Three 6 Mafia + Sean Kingston + Flo Rida- Feel it (House Remix) 7.Empire of the Sun- Walking on a Dream (Sweet Dream Remix) 8.MSTRKRFT John Legend- Heart breaker (Potts Dub Vocal Remix) 9.David Guetta and Estelle-One Love (Original Mix) 10.David Guetta and Estelle-One Love (Chuckie + Fatman Scoop Club Remix) 11.Daft Punk- Digital Love (Potts Vocal add of Day n Night)(Remix) 12.Daft Punk- Digital Love (Potts Heavy Abelton Remix) 13.Potts Vocal Add Harder Stronger Faster 14.Britney Spears-3 (Wolfgang Remix) 15.Potts Vocal Add- We are Friends 16.Chris Willis-Gettin Over 17.Ring Ring Ring (Club Mix) 18.Celebrity Vocal Drops 19.Timbaland-Morning After Dark (Thieves Remix) 20.Fatman Scoop-Get this Party Rockin (Remix) 21.Potts Vocal Add- 50 Cent-Baby by me 22.C Sparks-Put ya Drink up vs Satisfaction 23.Hoxton Whores-Numerology (Remix) 24.Adam K + Soha-Twilight vs Kings of Leon-Sex on Fire vs She Wolf (Potts Fire Remix) 25.Violins (Original Mix) 26.Cassius-Sounds of Violence 27.Kings of Leon- Use Somebody (Potts Electro Brain Bash Mix) 28.Duck Sauce-aNYway 29.So Much Love to Give (Potts Dub Remix) 30.Mario Outro

item.title: Soulwax on Brazil Street (DJ Bootleg)
item.description: Soulwax on Brazil Street (DJ Set) http://www10.zippyshare.com/v/48168684/file.html Lets hit 100,000 downloads this week Track list: 1.Rolling Stones Introduction 2.Say No Superstar (Potts/Abel Bootleg) 3.Infinity 2009 (Rework) 4.75, Brazil Street (Fish and Chips Remix) 5.I know you want me (Pitbull Rework) 6.Be Satisfaction (Laidback Luke/Swedish House Mafia) 7.Lets Dance (Bob Sinclar Re-edit) 8.On The Dancefloor (Will.I.Am & David Guetta Original mix) 9.The Reward is Cheese (MSTKRFT/Nore Vocal add) 10.The Reward is Missy (Vocal Remix) 11.Bounce (Deadmau5 Cheese Trap) 12.Kids (MGMT-Soulwax Remix) 13.Prank Phone Call-Mob Drug Prank
